Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Sorcerer): Know 2 S0 spells, cast 1 S1 spell/long rest
Abjure Enemy: R60' Use Channel Divinity to halt target (DC 16 Wis half speed) for 1 min
Cleansing Touch: May dispel a spell effect on a touched willing creature 2/long rest
Divine Sense: R60' May discern location of celestials, fiends, and undead for 1 rd 3/long rest
Elder Champion: Regain 10 HP/rd, cast spells as a bonus action, and inflict Disadv on saves vs. self spells on foes w/in 10' for 1 min 1/long rest
Elemental Adept (Acid): Acid spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Holy Nimbus: May emit a 30' bright light that inflicts 10 HP radiant to foes for 1 min 1/long rest
Lay On Hands: May heal 100 HP/long rest; may use 5 HP worth to cure disease or poison
Nature's Wrath: R10' Use Channel Divinity to create spectral vines that restrain target (DC 16 Dex or Str neg)
Purity Of Spirit: Has a continuous Protection From Evil And Good effect
Spell Sniper: Dbl attack spell range, ignore 3/4 cover, know additional attack cantrip
Turn The Faithless: R30' Use Channel Divinity to make fiends and fey flee (DC 16 Wis neg) for 1 min
Turn The Unholy: R30' May use Channel Divinity to make fiends and undead flee (DC 16 Wisdom neg) for 1 min
